title: HOUR 3 - Aaron Rodgers' Future
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Aaron Rodgers' Future
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Joy Taylor--in for Colin--welcomes in The NFL Network's MJ Acosta-Ruiz to react to Thursday night's 49ers-Titans game and Jimmy Garoppolo's performance, Aaron Rodgers as an MVP candidate and his future in Green Bay, and other sizzling NFL storylines. Finally, Santa Joy Taylor hands out some Christmas gifts to people in the sports world.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
